io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay

Class WorldMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mountainrange.mule.gameplay.WorldMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Tile>

    public class WorldMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Tile>
    A class to represent the map and facilitates interactions between the actual data store and the rest of the program

      • countTilesWithMule

        public int countTilesWithMule(Player player,
                              MuleType mule)
        Count the number of tiles owned by the given player with the given MULE installed.
        Parameters:
        player - player who owns the tiles
        mule - mule installed on the tiles
        Returns:
        number of tiles that the player owns with the mule installed

      • tilesWithMule

                                         MuleType mule)

        Parameters:
        player - player who owns the tiles
        mule - mule installed on the tiles
        Returns:
        unmodifiable set of tiles with the given mule installed and owned by the given player

      • placeMule

        public boolean placeMule(Player player,
                         Tile tile)
        Places a MULE for the given player on the given tile. Placing fails if the given player does not actually own the given tile, the player is not carrying a MULE, or the player is carrying a MULE that has not been outfitted.
        Parameters:
        player - player to get mule from
        tile - tile to set mule
        Returns:
        whether the mule was placed
